title: PBE and Alpha Tester
body:
Hi guys.

So like many of you I applied to become a PBE tester and today i received a notification saying that i got accepted. However when I clicked the link to get in to it it was to be an alpha tester. Now, I don't want t sound ungrateful or anything cuz i don't mind but i think something wrong happened. What should i do?

replies.body: I thought all PBE accounts had access to the PBE alpha client though?
